rows.label: qev095205_MSG0001
rows.name:
Living together with those who do not possess an Ovah
is a cause for lingering doubts, but I suppose it is
necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095205_MSG0002
rows.name:
We have no means to survive, save by allying ourselves
to you or the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095205_MSG0003
rows.name: We can only hope that this was the correct choice.[ST:wait ]
